name: Ravivara
fasting: Surya Vrat - Fasting on Sunday brings blessings of Sun God, improves health and removes obstacles
description: Ravivara (Sunday) is ruled by the Sun (Surya), the king of all planets. It is considered highly auspicious for government-related work, meeting officials, starting new ventures, and spiritual practices. The Sun represents soul, authority, father, and vitality.

name: Somavara
fasting: Somvar Vrat - Dedicated to Lord Shiva, brings peace of mind, good relationships, and emotional stability
description: Somavara (Monday) is ruled by the Moon (Chandra), representing mind, mother, and emotions. It is sacred to Lord Shiva and is highly auspicious for spiritual practices, starting relationships, and water-related activities. Fasting on Monday is very popular for seeking Lord Shiva's blessings.

name: Mangalavara
fasting: Mangalvar Vrat - Dedicated to Lord Hanuman, removes Mangal Dosha, brings courage and success over enemies
description: Mangalavara (Tuesday) is ruled by Mars (Mangal), the planet of energy, courage, and action. It is sacred to Lord Hanuman and is good for property matters, physical activities, and overcoming obstacles. However, it is generally avoided for auspicious ceremonies like weddings.

name: Budhavara
fasting: Budhvar Vrat - Dedicated to Lord Vishnu, improves intelligence, communication skills, and business success
description: Budhavara (Wednesday) is ruled by Mercury (Budh), the planet of intelligence, communication, and commerce. It is highly auspicious for education, business dealings, writing, and all intellectual pursuits. Mercury represents speech, intellect, and analytical abilities.

name: Guruvara
fasting: Guruvar Vrat - Dedicated to Lord Brihaspati, brings wisdom, prosperity, good fortune, and spiritual growth
description: Guruvara (Thursday) is ruled by Jupiter (Guru/Brihaspati), the most benefic planet representing wisdom, fortune, and spirituality. It is considered the most auspicious day for religious ceremonies, marriages, education, and starting new ventures. Thursday is sacred to Lord Vishnu.

name: Shukravara
fasting: Shukravar Vrat - Dedicated to Goddess Santoshi Maa and Lakshmi, brings wealth, love, marital bliss, and beauty
description: Shukravara (Friday) is ruled by Venus (Shukra), the planet of love, beauty, and luxury. It is sacred to Goddess Lakshmi and Santoshi Maa. Friday is highly auspicious for marriages, buying jewelry and clothes, artistic pursuits, and all matters related to love and beauty.

name: Shanivara
fasting: Shanivar Vrat - Dedicated to Lord Shani, removes Sade Sati effects, brings discipline, longevity, and karmic balance
description: Shanivara (Saturday) is ruled by Saturn (Shani), the planet of karma, discipline, and justice. While Saturn is often feared, Saturday is excellent for charity, serving the elderly, and performing remedies. Worshipping Lord Shani and Hanuman on this day reduces malefic effects of Saturn.
